properties.name: spring.security.issuer
properties.description: List of URLs that are open to access without authentication.

properties.name: spring.security.pubKey
properties.description: The public jwt api key file path.

properties.name: java.lang.String
properties.description: The private jwt api key file path.

properties.name: spring.security.encryptStrength
properties.description: the log rounds to use, between 4 and 31 required by org.springframework.security.crypto.bcrypt.BCryptPasswordEncoder.

properties.name: spring.security.openUrl
properties.description: List of URLs that are open to access without authentication.

properties.name: spring.security.allowedOrigins
properties.description: List of allowed origins in CORS requests.

properties.name: spring.security.allowedMethods
properties.description: List of allowed methods in CORS requests.

properties.name: spring.security.allowedHeaders
properties.description: List of allowed headers in CORS requests.

properties.name: spring.security.jwtExpirationTime
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT tokens. If not set, the generated jwt expires in 15 minutes.

properties.name: spring.security.stackTraceLogEnable
properties.description: Enable or disable Throwable.printStackTrace calling on error handler.

properties.name: spring.security.pathsRedirect
properties.description: The name represents the path to be redirected and the value represents the paths that will be redirected to.
